Title: The Musical
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Wil Calhoun, David Budin (executive story editor), Brendan McCarthy (executive story editor)
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Grace wants Frankie to go to the hospital after a medical incident, but Frankie insists on alternative healing. The protests disrupt Robert's play.
